form.official-title: To amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to halt the issuance of immigrant and nonimmigrant visas to nationals of recalcitrant countries, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Alien Criminal Expulsion Act or the ACE Act.
